page.title: 03WOMERSLEY VILLAGE.
page.content: In the village the average number of people living in one house is three.Two of which are over the age of 18.Six out of Fifteen children are under 16 years old . The children which are still at school travel to Pontefract, Knottingley or Selby. Four out of Fifteen people are retired. Some are self employed , others are nurses,architects e.t.c.and have to travel out of the area to their work place.The rest work on local farms. 80% of the people own their homes & 20% are council owned. Most of the villagers have lived there for at least Ten years. There are no large shops, or Supermarkets,only small ones. During the summer there are fetes and galas held annually.
